contributeForm.title: Contribution
contributeForm.description:
On this screen, you can purchase SPACE tokens with ETH in Ropsten testnet. Use the calculator below to evaluate sum for the desired amount of tokens.

Just input the amount of ETH you want to contribute and find out the number of SPACE tokens you will get. Please note that a little ETH adding on top to cover the gas fee. What is gas fee?
contributeForm.calc: You are buying ~{{tokens}} SPACE tokens for {{eth}} ETH
contributeForm.kycAlert: KYC/AML verification is required for contribution
contributeForm.test: This dashboard is demonstration and works in a test blockchain. Please, do not send real ETH here

initBuyTokensForm.tip: You can find your mnemonic phrase in a {{companyName}}_wallet.txt file which was downloaded to your PC automatically during the registration process.
